path.style: vector-effect: none; opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0.5px; fill: rgb(127, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(229, 236, 246); stroke-opacity: 1;

rect.style: fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 0; stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0px;
